comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Oct 18, 1913 article in NYT [ query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9907EFDC133FE633A... ] is about a horrible balloon accident and there had apparently been another balloon accident on September 9. Perhaps that accounts for Bain having such a photo.

comment.author: 87606660@N00
comment._content: Looks like it may be a baloon reconnaissance unit. There were quite a few of them in that era. See www.falmanac.com/2008/02/my-dutiful-balloon-precarious-fo... for a short history.
